snippet: PETERS--Murray, passed away peacefully on June 7, 2016 in his 98th year surrounded by family. Beloved and cherished husband of the late Charlotte Peters and adored father of the late Jon Peters. He is survived by his daughter, Lonnie Resnick, son-in-law Norman Resnick, grandchildren Mitchell Resnick, Lindsay Resnick, Bruce Resnick, Jessie Peters, and his great-granddaughters, Carly Resnick and Kasey Resnick. He dedicated his adult life to his family and as an ardent supporter of Israel and the Jewish people. To the very end he had his wonderful stories and sense of humor. He is forever in our hearts and will be missed each and every day. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PETERS--Murray, passed away peacefully on June 7, 2016 in his 98th year surrounded by family. Beloved and cherished husband of the late Charlotte Peters and adored father of the late Jon Peters. He is survived by his daughter, Lonnie Resnick, son-in-law Norman Resnick, grandchildren Mitchell Resnick, Lindsay Resnick, Bruce Resnick, Jessie Peters, and his great-granddaughters, Carly Resnick and Kasey Resnick. He dedicated his adult life to his family and as an ardent supporter of Israel and the Jewish people. To the very end he had his wonderful stories and sense of humor. He is forever in our hearts and will be missed each and every day. 1/3
